response: One of the most significant and challenging projects I worked on is LeBin, a smart bin powered by AI technology designed to improve waste classification and promote sustainable waste management. My role in the project was as an AI engineer, where I worked on training and optimizing the AI model to accurately classify different types of waste, including various plastic materials. One of the biggest challenges was enhancing the AI's ability to distinguish between similar-looking plastics, which required extensive data collection, model training, and fine-tuning. Through this project, I learned the importance of persistence, collaboration, and real-world AI applications. It reinforced my problem-solving skills, deepened my understanding of AI, and showed me how technology can drive positive environmental impact. The success of LeBin not only demonstrated the potential of AI in sustainability but also inspired me to continue innovating in the field.

LeBin is one of the most impactful projects I've worked on. As an AI engineer, I trained the system to classify waste more accurately, which involved overcoming challenges like distinguishing between similar plastics. This project taught me the value of teamwork, persistence, and innovation.

response: One of the most significant challenges I have faced was during my work on LeBin, the AI-powered smart bin project. A major hurdle was improving the AI's ability to accurately classify different types of plastic waste, as many materials looked similar and required a more refined classification model. Overcoming this challenge involved extensive data collection, model optimization, and iterative testing, which pushed me to problem-solve creatively and persistently. Through this experience, I learned the importance of resilience, teamwork, and continuous learning, as collaborating with my team and refining our approach ultimately led to a more effective AI system. Looking back on my journey, my passion for AI and technology has driven me to constantly seek growth and innovation. Competing in the Rethink Plastic competition and working on LeBin were pivotal moments that shaped my skills and mindset. I am most proud of my ability to take on challenges, push boundaries, and apply AI to real-world problems.
